ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: How about having one of the pieces give a bonus to all songs that are sung? Maybe the helm could be +15% to songs that are sung.  For instrument songs the
ygData.messageBody:
How about having one of the pieces give a bonus to all songs that are sung?
Maybe the helm could be +15% to songs that are sung. For instrument songs
the bonus would increase what you could do without an instrument but
certainly wouldn't equal what you could do with one. For other songs it
would just give a way to help those out.

Kit

i'm with you right up til the end. that would be totally unbalancing to
have an
instrument double the effect. actually on further thought it would be
pretty
unbalancing period. can you imagine singing 3 chants with the drum effect
and being able to dual wield yaks? plus you'd be able to mix instrument
song
types and get the maximum usage out of the songs without having to switch
instruments and at the same time have the bonus of using weapons.
